name: MIDI Player
description: Plays standard MIDI files from the MicroSD card, outputting MIDI messages and converting MIDI to CV/gates. Can sync to internal clock, analogue clock, or MIDI clock.

parameters.name: Folder
parameters.description: Chooses the folder of MIDI files on the card.

parameters.name: File
parameters.description: Chooses the MIDI file within the folder.

parameters.name: Play
parameters.description: Starts/stops playback using the internal timebase.

parameters.name: Start from bar
parameters.description: Sets the bar number within the file from which to start playback.

parameters.name: File change
parameters.description: Sets the behaviour when a new file is chosen.

parameters.name: File restart
parameters.description: Sets how the file position changes when switching to a new file.

parameters.name: Track mode 1-24
parameters.description: Set the playback mode for the track (1-24).

parameters.name: 1-4 MIDI channel
parameters.description: MIDI channel for the MIDI/CV converter (1-4).

parameters.name: 1-4 Pitch output
parameters.description: Bus for the MIDI/CV converter pitch output (1-4). (0=None)

parameters.name: 1-4 Gate output
parameters.description: Bus for the MIDI/CV converter gate output (1-4). (0=None)

parameters.name: Drum first note
parameters.description: The first (lowest) note for the drum converter.

parameters.name: Drum channel
parameters.description: MIDI channel for the drum converter (0=Off).

parameters.name: Trigger length
parameters.description: Sets the length of output trigger pulses.

parameters.name: Convert live MIDI
parameters.description: If enabled, MIDI sent to the algorithm is converted by its MIDI/CV converters.

parameters.name: Clock multiplier
parameters.description: Sets the multiplier for incoming analogue clock pulses.

parameters.name: Clock input
parameters.description: The bus to use as the analogue clock input (0=None).

parameters.name: Reset input
parameters.description: The bus to use as the reset input (0=None).

parameters.name: Reset mode
parameters.description: Sets the mode for the reset input.

parameters.name: Follow MIDI clock
parameters.description: Sets whether the algorithm follows incoming MIDI clock.

parameters.name: Output MIDI clock
parameters.description: Set whether the algorithm outputs MIDI clock.

parameters.name: Output to breakout
parameters.description: Enables MIDI output to the breakout.

parameters.name: Output to Select Bus
parameters.description: Enables MIDI output to the Select Bus.

parameters.name: Output to USB
parameters.description: Enables MIDI output to USB.

parameters.name: Output to internal
parameters.description: Enables internal MIDI output (sent to other algorithms).
